channel.title: Help with drops
channel.description:
Me and my mate have made a server ... but occasionally our drops dont work... sometimes we log in they work sometimes they dont ... do you have a way to combat this.
Also i have recently added specials onto the server but cannot use Invisible Armour anymore...
Are you can see this is testscape source...
Help please.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 12:14:52 PM[/size][hr]...

item.title: Help with drops
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Ok many new Commers are Posting Topics Like “Hell Damn HEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEELP”.
Why you do that, this isnt needed, if you just post like “Need help with Dragons” for Example just post that and the Guy who views will know what its about.
And its more easy.

Read full topic
